name: Burnt Fuselage
description: With a dose of cognac smoothed out with Grand Marnier, and the sweet edge taken off by adding dry vermouth, the Burnt Fuselage is pleasantly silky and fortifying--and, as the book notes, after working through one of these "your own fuselage will be warm, to say the least."

recipeInstructions.text: Combine ingredients in a bar glass and fill with ice. Stir well for 20 to 30 seconds and strain into chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with twist of orange peel.
